targets.expr: (sum(increase(http_request_total{job="backend-svc", namespace=~"$namespace",status_code=~"4.."}[$__range]) or vector(0)) + sum(increase(http_request_total{job="backend-svc",namespace=~"$namespace", status_code=~"5.."}[$__range]) or vector(0))) / sum(increase(http_request_total{job="backend-svc", namespace=~"$namespace",}[$__range]))
sum by (path) (http_requests_in_progress{job="backend-svc", namespace=~"$namespace", path!="/metrics"}) > 1 or vector(0)
